attributes.additional_details: Opening hours should be restricted, they are now open from 8am to 10.10pm this is inviting gambling, they should be 9am-6pm it deprives workers of having a relationship with their family I want the government to revise the opening hours.  There are casinos for the gamblers, the betting offices are only kept open because of the machine.  children are being deprived of parents working in these shops it causes strain in relationships and thus breakdown of relationship or divorce
